trans-unit.source:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]Releasat is a biological indicator culturing kit containing MesaStrip paper strip biological indicators and culture tubes of specially formulated soybean casein digest culture medium containing a color indicator which turns a dramatic yellow when spores grow. Releasat culture kits are available for monitoring industrial steam, chlorine dioxide, or ethylene oxide and dry heat sterilization processes.

The color indicator provides visual results within 24 hours (steam), 48 hours (chlorine dioxide) or 72 hours (EO / DRY) as opposed to the standard seven days. Releasat medium is used to culture the MesaStrip in place of “generic” soybean casein digest medium and provides a more rapid read-out. Each lot of Releasat culture tubes are quality control tested with appropriate MesaStrips.[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="30"][dt_vc_list style="1" dividers="true"]

  • 24 hour results (steam) / 48 hour results (ClO2) / 72 hour results (EO)

  • Dramatic color change


[/dt_vc_list][dt_gap height="10"][vc_toggle title="BMF Product" open="false"]Bozeman Manufacturing Facility (BMF) – located in Bozeman, Montana
Primary Products - EZTest, Apex products, MagnaAmp, MesaStrip

Customer Service Contacts:
bozcustserv@mesalabs.com
406.585.9535 or 877.746.8883
FAX: 406.585.9219[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_accordion active_tab="2"][vc_accordion_tab title="Technical Specifications"][vc_column_text]

Releasat® for Steam Sterilization


[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Spore

G. stearothermophilus[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Incubation

24 Hours at 55-60°C[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Sets/box

100[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Population

106[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Reorder #

RS6/100[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text]

Releasat® for Ethylene Oxide or Dry Heat Sterilization


[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Spore

B. atrophaeus[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Incubation

72 Hours at 37±1°C[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Sets/box

100[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Population

Releasat® for Chlorine Dioxide Sterilization


[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Spore

B. atrophaeus[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Incubation

48 Hours at 37±1°C[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Sets/box

100[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Population

106[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Reorder #

ACD/6 (100 spore strips) & RM/100 (100 media tubes)[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text]Storage: Room temperature

Expiration: 12 months from date of manufacture

Certification: MesaStrip biological indicators are traceable to a recognized culture collection and certified for population. D-value and performance using Releasat media. Each set includes MesaStrips and Releasat media.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Manuals & Documents"][vc_column_text]Material Safety Data Sheet

trans-unit.target:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]Releasat ist ein Bioindikator-Kultivierungsset, das MesaStrip-Papierstreifen-Bioindikatoren und Kulturröhrchen mit speziell entwickeltem Sojakasein-Kulturmedium enthält. Das Kulturmedium beinhaltet einen Farbanzeiger, der sich zu einem intensiven Gelb verändert, wenn die Sporen wachsen. Die Releasat-Kultivierungssets stehen zur Überwachung industrieller Dampf-, Chlordioxid- oder Ethylenoxid- und Trockenhitze-Sterilisationsverfahren zur Verfügung.

Im Gegensatz zur standardmäßigen Bereitstellung von Ergebnissen nach sieben Tagen liefert der Farbanzeiger bereits innerhalb von 24 Stunden (Dampf), 48 Stunden (Chlordioxid) oder 72 Stunden (EO / Trockenhitze) visuelle Ergebnisse. Das Releasat-Medium wird verwendet, um den MesaStrip anstelle des “generischen” Sojakasein-Mediums zu kultivieren und schnellere Ablesungen zu ermöglichen. Jede Charge der Releasat-Kulturröhrchen wird mit passenden MesaStrips einer Qualitätskontrolle unterzogen.[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="30"][dt_vc_list style="1" dividers="true"]

  • Ergebnisse innerhalb von 24 Stunden (Dampf) / 48 Stunden (ClO2) / 72 Stunden (EO)

  • Intensiver Farbwechsel


[/dt_vc_list][dt_gap height="10"][vc_toggle title="BMF-Produkt" open="false"]Fertigungseinrichtung Bozeman (BMF) – in Bozeman, Montana
Primäre Produkte - EZTest, Apex-Produkte, MagnaAmp, MesaStrip

Kundendienstkontakte:
bozcustserv@mesalabs.com
406.585.9535 oder 877.746.8883
FAX: 406.585.9219[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_accordion active_tab="2"][vc_accordion_tab title="Technische Spezifikationen"][vc_column_text]

72 Stunden bei 37±1°C[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]Sets/Kiste

ACD/6 (100 Sporenstreifen) & RM/100 (100 Medienröhrchen)[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text]Lagerung: Raumtemperatur

Verfall: Nach 12 Monaten ab dem Herstellungsdatum

Zertifizierung: MesaStrip-Bioindikatoren sind auf eine anerkannte Kulturensammlung rückführbar und für Population, D-Wert und Leistung mittels Releasat-Medium zertifiziert. Jedes Set umfasst MesaStrips und Releasat-Medium.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Handbücher & Dokumente"][vc_column_text]Materialsicherheitsdatenblatt
